item.title: $1 million saved for retirement ‘ain’t what it used to be’: American workers still have a long way to go
item.description: It turns out that “a million dollars is nothing” when you really crunch the numbers on retirement savings.

item.title: Crypto, the dollar, stocks and credit are telling the Fed it needs to cut, popular strategist says
item.description: Risk-on assets are heading toward a “liquidity event” unless the Fed refills the punch bowl.
